review: My experience at this resturaunt in the past had always been good. On one particular night the hostess told us the wrong drink specials. My group of friends ordered drinks believing they were two for one. After we saw the bill and asked for the manager he accused us of lying then recanted his statement and lowered the bill two drinks when we bought six. Mediocre food, friendly service, disgusting manager.

Very good! I come here pretty much every few weeks with friends. The two for $20 is a great deal. We order two drinks and the two for $20 and are never disappointed. I love the cajun chicken pasta, alot!  I shared a molten chocolate cake a few times, so chocolately, so good, but I'm hardly ever able to finish it. Big portions!
I found myself in Long Island for business. It took about an hour to get the food and there was no one there on a late Thursday night. Worst service ever but the steak was actually pretty good.

our new favorite chilis....im taking away a star because the floor were we sat was a mess and should of been swept before we sat down not while we were sitting... BUt besides that the waitress was great very attentive and nice!  Food was great! We had the 2 for 35 deal....which is way to much food for just 35 dollars! Newly remodeled and very nice family atomsphere..( we went at 6pm on a saturday).

Went in for lunch, waited 25 minutes for drinks before we left, asked to speak to the manager after another 10 minutes he came out of the kitchen, we told him what happened and he just didnt care.  So now its been 45 minutes and we still havent received our drinks.  Oh, did I mention there were only two tables in the place.  And it was filthy.  Cant tell you about the food, because we never received any.  We left.  Worst service, filthy restaurant and jerkoff manager.

Our bartender was Paige on a Sunday afternoon for a football game. No personality and looked like she didn't even enjoy doing her job. The guys next to me even made a comment on how horrible she was.  We asked for the appetizer first and it came out all together with our meal. We weren't going to send the main dish back so we were forced to eat it all together.  It just seemed like we were a bother to her and the vibe was felt within the other customers as well. Will never come back with my friends for Sunday football. The only reason why I'm giving any stars was because the food was ok.

Normally I would never go to this type of restaurant. I just don't have a lot of confidence in these food franchises but I was clearly wrong where this place is concerned. I visited Chilis for the first time because a friend is a fan and I was going to get her a gift card. However, I was curious and wanted to check it out first, just in case. Well, the food was great. We ordered the chicken ranch quesadilla and it was delicious. My only complaint is that for the price there should have been a little more of it. I had the chicken margarita entree which was tender and flavorful and very filling. For an addl three bucks, they added some grilled shrimp to my dish and they were also great. My girlfriend had the combo with steak and chicken and that was also delicious, especially the steak. So juicy and savory, you almost didn't need a knife. I know, it's amazing, who would've thought Chilis? We sat in a booth near the bar and the multiple tv screens were cool to watch while waited for food. The waitress was nice and efficient and all our needs were taken care of. I didn't give them 5 stars because I thought the prices were a little high but other than that, I recommend this place for a quick meal.

Very crowded on a Saturday night lol Got to this place asked them how long is the wait for too they said 35 min. I was like ok took that little device and got called 10 min after not bad so my tip to ya is if they tell u 35 min don't leave they will call b4 the 35 min thank u.

I really love Chili's. As far as chain restaurants go, Chili's is by far my favorite. They have delicious mini sliders (def. dip them in the ranch dressing, you'll thank me later). Love the appetizer sampler, get the boneless wings and southwest egg rolls. They also have really yummy chicken crispers. Chili's is my go-to spot if I'm looking for cheap, greasy food. Do not come here looking for real food. Don't order a steak or pasta dish and then complain when it tastes like crap. What did you expect? You have no one to blame but yourself.  I will say that they really need to step up their game a bit as far as service goes. I'm completely understanding when a place is crowded and I may have to wait a few extra minutes for my drink. That makes sense. But the last time I was here, it wasn't crowded at all and our waitress was horrible. She took forever to come see us, then forever to bring us our drinks. Once we did get our food she didn't even come over once to see if we needed anything else. Stuff like that really bothers me, especially when we saw her at one point talking with her friends in the back. Hello! Do your job first and then you can hang out with your friends.

Never could go wrong for the 2 for 1 drinks. From beers on tap to frozen or straight up margaritas on the rocks. LOVE THAT. Plus the free chips and salsa on the side, but make sure you have lots of napkins cause the chips can be greasy and its messy with the salsa on top. They seemed to have renovated and up did the place, there were new booths and tables. The waiter was really nice and you have another waiter who works the same section that offers there help or can get you things too if the other waiter ain't available. I enjoyed both of them. Me and my girlfriend did the 2 for $20 deal which you cant go wrong with at all, not only does it save you $ in your pocket but they offer good foods on the menu including the famous baby baby back ribs that everyone can sing off the tip of there tongue. You get a appetizer and entree which is good enough for me, then of course you can always add a nice dessert but we chose more margaritas please! I enjoy coming to this place for my 2 for ones and just a quick bite to eat and catch up with my friends. I wouldn't come here that much but for the bar I def. come around more. It can also get busy and loud on game nights which is a good time also.

I had higher expectation from Chili's.  But this place really disappointed me.  The place felt stuffy and by the end of our dinner, I already started sweating.  Also, my baby back ribs came out dry and burnt as if they were left over in the kitchen for hours.  Table and chairs were sticky.  I don't think I will ever return to the place.  I've lost my confidence in Chili's quality and consistency.  The only plus was the friendly waiter.

I NEVER had a bad experience here. The staff is so friendly and the food never disappoints. Not to mention 2 for 1 frozen or on the rock drinks is an awesome deal and it goes on at anytime of the day. The chips and salsa are the best way to start a meal. As well as the appetizer sampler. The only bad experience was with Pricilla the bartender. I asked for a Coronita. Which is the margarita with a coronita in it. She filled it up ways to much knowing another drink pours into it over time and when she handed me the drink because wit was so full, yep you guessed it ALLL over the bar. And I was the one who mostly wiped it down. Wasn't happy about that. Even my friend I was with was annoyed.  I gave this 5 stars because after terrible experiences at Applebee's this is my go to place. Fun for a girls night or guys night. Even for a date night.  I recommend the quesadillas. They have bacon in them! Bacon!!!!! Who doesn't love bacon!

Had a great time with the family. The only negative part was the slow and lack of basic service, for example water was never brought  to out table and the wait for our main entree was rather long. Luckily we had our appetizers to keep us busy but even then we were finish with them way before main entree arrived. The wait was worth it because everything was delicious! I will definitely be back.

The food here is great and also really good for kids the kids get a meal side and a drink for under 6.00 dollars. The 2 for one margarine is also a great deal. I have also ways enjoyed the food here and the nice staff. My favorite appetizer here is the Texas cheese fires I highly recommend those! Also the 2 for meal you can't go wrong a meal side and a appetizer is only 20 bucks! Great deal!

Gone for the purpose of a day or night out as not to cook. Granted food is good but not out of this world. Indeed I agree that service is slow & at times I noticed it even slower on days where it was nearly empty, perplexed? As was I how is it I saw my servers less than usual on a busier day. I am not one that wants to be catered to hand and foot I just don't want to be forgotten. I have to wave someone passing by or raise my hand as if school to get their attention on a quiet day. I am no means related to the mention of certain waitress who I will write below about & bartender in another posting, Priscilla but I never had issues with her or any otther.  Now granted I vented about my issues of the slow service though I must say the exception is to a waitress named Drea, very charming & friendly. What makes her stand apart from others is I have now gone on different occasions & can recall my orders or likes. She is very quick but I would say more than 95% on point unlike others not to mention attentive. Like watching the Tazmanian devil whiz by & getting stuff for our table even before we ask or have to look for her. If you should go, look for her or ask for her section! Granted orders can get messed up but that can also be the cooking staff fault.

I don't think I've ever had a bad experience here. This is probably My favorite place to go to. It's Inexpensive and delicious.  The honey chipotle crispy chicken tenders along with their ranch dipping sauce is my absolute favorite thing in the world. Could honestly eat it every day. Enough said !!!!!
The food was great the service was on point ...thank you Chili's because Johnny Rockets was RUDE as Fcuk!

Whole family is up on the toilet and my 17 month old has been throwing up and unable to keep anything down. Had the chicken fajitas and the chicken tenders. We should have left when the childrens coloring book smelled like fuel. I will not chance going here again.

I happen to love the food from here not sure why it only has a 3 star rating. My food is always good and made the way I like it. More importantly I just called in an order and had an extremely nice gentleman named Ty answer and he was so nice on the phone it made me want to order more. There should be more customer service people like him. Thank you Ty and Chili's for a great experience, it goes unnoticed sometimes!

Iv been here a few times and I can't believe I haven't writen a review for this place yet...  Ok so like any chills but since its around my house super convent for me to just stop by for a quick lunch.... I usually come here for lunch with my friends...get the tiro appetizer or the two for twenty meals which is two entires and an appetizer as well...pretty good deal.... There chicken salads pretty good and thiapla  pretty good as well...but the mango sauce is too over powering...the steaks I'm not a big fan of so are there desserts... Pastas tasteless...like microwave pasta... No taste at all ...served with the the text toast bread...you can tell the quality is not as good  as it suppose to....my friends are crazy about the chocolate molten cake...with a side of ice cream ...she always order it when she comes here... There is a big parking lot ...the area is big so don't worry about seatings ....if you want to go order ....go enter from the side...if you enter in the front they will just point you to the side to get take out...

I wanted to come here and give this place five stars.  Why give three star averages to such a lovely establishment? Pro: Kiosk at your table.  You can see you bill and swipe your credit card on it when you are done.  No more waiting for the waitress/waiter. You can rate your dinner on the little kiosk machines by taking a quick survey. Cons: This review is skewed because we had horrible service. Extremely long wait for menu, drinks, appetizers, steak sauce, etc... Our waitress would acknowledge when we asked her for something but then she never come back with the product.  This happened twice.  Example, can we please get steak sauce?  Then the waitress said ok and then showed up 20 minutes later clueless and confused. Steak was medium well instead of medium rare. Appetizer and entrees were all cold.

My kids love Chili's and beg me to come here. It used to be a 4 star experience. Good food that appeals to the kids and a fresh entree for me (the mango tilapia was great!). Lately, I have to say the service has been lacking (items missing from our table orders) and the place seems askew. Hopefully the management can turn it around and we will return.

Why I will not go to Chilis and I will post a review on line about this., Your staten island location charges a dollar if you play a game on the table with the computer. Eventhough I did get charged and played no game I still got billed. After them refunding my dollar I told them that's not professional to do in a restaurant.  You should stop that service of playing games . It is ridiculous and needs to be stopped. Cut that out asap! Most of you people don't even check your receipts probably cause ur fools and wonder why you get billed a dollar...don't be a sucker

I always like to go to Chili's.  There are great menu options and of course the 2 for 1 priced margaritas keep me happy.  My current favorite meal is the Santa Fe chicken salad. The restaurant is always clean minus the bathroom that needs some attention.  Friday nights are crazy, but you can always get a seat at the bar.  I've never had a bad meal here and the staff is great!

Great for quick bite to eat, clean and our waiter was great. I hate to have to ask for refills he was on top of as soon as my drink was low the refill was there. Menu has lots of options and you can pay with kiosk on table. Overall was a pleasant experience.

When I come to this restaurant I feel like a well served patron. We get seated right away without too much of wait time. The server was friendly and attentive in satisfying all of our needs. The decor and ambiance was more than comfortable and welcoming. There are seats around the bar that customers can sit at. After our orders are in, there was a little bit of wait time till the dishes are served. On this particular occasion one dish was brought out later than the rest, so the server waived the cost for that dish. The pricing was fair for such an establishment. We had a great time dining at this bar/restaurant. We definitely will come back in the future.

I really thought I left a review earlier. I been here many times.. When I really want a cheap and good food. Their place is always busy. They have annoying little machines to pay bills and keep the kids busy.. Oh yea even you from taking to your date (so you can argue later more) I would enjoy a more quitter place then this place.. So be aware re loud and just like Applebee's really busy! Food is all the same nothing memorable.. Their drinks now I remember those! Lol The bartenders are serving up great drinks and not ran down with juice it's actually serving a portion of alcohol in them. Makes you think other places aren't.  I been here a few times just to enjoy time by the bar.

My experience here has me questioning whether or not I should go to large chain restaurants. My fork n knife were both dirty ...the waitress had an attitude when I asked for clean ones. Then when our drinks arrived there was a disgusting stain on the glass that looked like dried up cheese. I was absolutely disgusted and didn't eat my food. I literally sat there n waited for my friend to finish because it was literally the worst experience..almost as bad as Applebee's next door smh

I use to go here often until I order Quesadillas as a go order for my sister. A quesadilla had a fake nail cook within it (an acrylic tip that had fallen off of a nail). DISGUSTING!!! Will never go here again. The food was always good but if this happened I can't imagine the hygienic standard in which the food is prepared. Stay away.

The food was salty, microwaved frozen food, sloppy environment...and the utensils were dirty...our server definetly  had somewhere else to go... Thanks for reminding why I will never choose this place to dine in at any location!!

Love the food. Went with a group of 4 adults. Only problem was the wait. A bit crowded but while waiting almost 30 mins I counted 6 empty and already cleaned tables just sitting empty. Doesn't seem like a good way to do business or make money by having people wait and having empty revenue producing tables just sitting there empty

So disappointed if there was anything lower I'd  give it. . After not being with my friend for a good 3 years, we go to CHILI's. Terrible terrible terrible. The long Island iced-iced tea without the long (liquor). The food I asked for a veriety of 3. I don't want to ever say the number 3 again. Buffalo wings with no sauce,  fried pickles without the fried. I can go on but my bat is low.  Hey CHILE's, make the drinks right before serving this....if you want to call it food. But the BARTENDER his personality was nice. That's why he's in the front.
Had dinner here tonight 7/25/15. Everything was on point. It looks updated. The food was great.  Better than some local restaurants. I'd definitely go back again.

Kelly was our server and she was exceptionally great!  Very honest and knowledgeable in what to try and what not to. Ordered the fried pickles on her recommendation,.DELICIOUS!  The pickles tasted fresh and briney! The 6 oz sirloin was made to perfection. Thw service was great!! I don't come ro Staten Island often, but if I do..will come back

Had a coupon for a free order of shrimp. I did not see the shrimp until the end and they brought it out in a plastic cup.. Really? I could not get my food in a plate like a normal person? Staff is rude and pushy and the manager was not helpful and did not care. This place was once a gem but has gotten so bad that people barely even go anymore.

Went there for Veterans Day, I ordered a ten ounce steak and my wife ordered the chicken. both came with Broccoli that we asked to have well steamed to make it somewhat soft. When it arrived it was so hard and tasteless that we thought of sending it back but then we decided not to. Come on, the steak was tossed on to the plate with Broccoli dumped in in the least attractive way. We'll know better next time to go else where.

I also was here for Veteran's Day. The service was dreadful, with a waitress who was obviously getting by on her looks (and doing a pretty good job!). Everything else was great - the food, portions and discounts for Vets were appreciated. One thing - watch your bill. They slip in a .99 cent charge for those little machines you can order from and pay your check on. If you don't use it, don't pay for it.

Service is good. Ice water comes in nice mugs. Chicken is flavorful.  Salad is sorely lacking in greens and character. It is the most dressing drenched salad ever made, with inferior tasting ingredients. At over $10 for a salad, more is expected on all levels: ingredient quality, proper ratio of salad (I.e. healthy stuff) to dressing, and inventive dressing, not just chemically ranch-esque drenching all over, in between, and underneath soggy leaves.
WORST SERVICE EVER, MANAGER IS A DOUCHEBAG.! Waitress was missing for 20 minutes . If you see her please call chillis bc she is still missing.

Our server Mara was exceptional! She was very attentive and friendly. She had great recommendations for drinks (tropical sunrise margarita and the blueberry pineapple margarita are a must have if you enjoy fruity drinks!) and the food came out quick. This is the first time I've been here since they've updated their menu and the smoked chicken burrito was delicious!
Love it!!! And my margarita two for one all day.. The service is always good and the staff is very friendly and their happy hour is a plush just wish they had free nachos

Horrible horrible service took forever... got there at 3:57 my sons bday dinner and didn't leave until 7:30, messed up a dinner order misunderstood everything manager was a joke and no help I am never going back to this location. I've been in this business for 12 years and I would NEVER treat customers like I was treated instead of I'm sorry I'll fix it was excuse after excuse... Worst experience... Honestly I'm embarrassed for them...

Wow it doesn't get anymore Authentic Mexican than this ....... NOT !! LOL But for a franchise its not bad at all . We ended up here after a local Burrito Joint we visited didn't have high chairs for the baby and there was no way we were going to hold her on our lap while trying to eat so we left and came to Chili's instead When we first got here the girls said it was a 20-minute wait but we've ended up waiting more like 40 minutes which I understand because it's very hard to tell when people are going to get up from the table so I don't blame the girls for being off the waiting time After being seated everything looked and smelled delicious and it was hard to decide what to order, I myself ordered the Boneless Wings appetizer and a fish taco a prime rib taco and a chicken Ranchero taco  For a drink I ordered the mango Patron margarita which was very good and was served in a small Patron bottle with an empty glass next to it so I can pour as a drink which was a really cool idea. Also the Guac was very very good and the thin tortilla chips were BOMB Now for the service the waitress was very nice but our food took abnormally long to come to the table, I totally understand that it was a Saturday afternoon and I know they were busy by the looks of it but even so it still took pretty long. Overall good experience , 4 adults 4 kids $104.00 not bad at all , I'll definitely be back. Imo it was better than the other franchises like TGIF'S, APPLEBEE'S ETC..

Stopped in with a few of my girlfriends  from work during our lunch. We got seated right away. We ordered something right away so that way we wouldn't(well shouldn't be rushing) the place was no where near crowded. None of us ordered any thing that needed to take long to prepare. We waited 25 minutes for our food. Ok by this point i was slightly upset but that would have gotten at least a 3 star rating.  I had to send back my drink because the mug was dirty (so now we are down to them deserving 2 stars) all none of us were able to even eat more than the side of fries that came with our meal because the lunch clock was now ticking. We  were seated next to one of the stations that they keep the wrapped up knives and forks and some condiments like ketchup and hot sauce and stuff a waiter seated some other guests and went to get them some wrapped cutlery one of the wrapped sets fell on the floor this poorly trained waitress picked it up and flung it back in the basket. (by this time if i could give zero stars for that alone i would have) because that is down right disgusting not to mention a violation for a restaurant type of establishment. All in all if i was dying of hunger and was on richmond ave in staten island ever again i will not even step foot in this place.  Service=2 stars Food=2 stars Staff training= 0 stars  Speed=1 star  Not satisfied at all the wrapped fork set  dropping  on the floor  and the waitress putting it back in the basket was the lat straw for me. What if some child had gotten it and used the napkin to wipe their mouth. Who knows what they could be exposed to. Chili's please do better at training your staff.

do not eat here this place is the most disgusting unsanitary establishment! my nephew receive raw buffalo chicken wings and he and I both had a hair on our plate! what a disgusting poor excuse of an establishment

Had me and my friends waiting outside 15 minutes. Only to tell us they are opening Late Bc the fire dept was there, even though we didn't see any evidence of the fire dept being there. The staff inside seen us waiting and didn't say anything for the 15 minutes, after we made a phone call. We will never dine at this place again. I'll make sure no one I knows goes there either.

If I could give zero star I would. It took 20min for anyone to talk to us once seated. Our order came out completely wrong. Other tables were complaining and upset with staff members. Manager was all over the place carrying the same basket of food to all the visible tables asking if it was theirs. Unbelievable. Never again. Don't come.

We are visiting Staten Island and this was a familiar restaurant.  We were seated immediately but waited 10 minutes before the server even recognized we were there. Drinks and orders taken. Sodas came quickly. Our son's food came out a good 10 minutes before our meals. We didn't ask for this so he was finished way before we were finished. Overall, decent food, average service.

For a sit down franchise, Chilis isn't a bad option. I usually order Chilis to Go but occasionally I'll dine in and sit at the bar to watch sporting events.  Both options are great and the food quality and presentation are consistent. Ask for Priscilla at the bar. She makes the best drinks and she's super friendly.  Join the My Chilis Rewards to get alerts on new dishes, coupons, specials, etc.

I have been going to this Chilis location for the past 10 years. Cant speak for the other locations, but this one is my go to for any occasion or even if I just want great food and fast service. Never have I ever been disappointed by chilis. Highly recommend!

Came back after not coming for a year due to slow unattentive service . Came back last night, and it happened again. Waitress was more of an order taker, never smiled once, never came back for refills. Food was sub par.  The table behind us left and was never cleared of dirty dishes, food all over floor and restaurant over all filthy.  Will not be coming back anymore to what used to be our favorite restaurant.

This place had the best water I've ever drank.  It tasted like it arose from the teat of the highest mountain in the arctic circle.  Visions came to me of happy reindeer prancing in the snow outside Santa's workshop with every sip. 10/10 would drink again.  Oh and the food was good too.

Went in and sat for the Thu night NFL game - placed our order  and 25 min later another server comes over and asks again what did we order - Found that weird ? More time passed / we were handed a free bowl of chips/salsa which we did not want WHERES OUR FOOD ! We sat and waited and then finally after 45 minutes and no waitress in sight we demanded the MGR who came over and said whats the problem ITS only been 11 minutes - Excuse me its been 50 Minutes  you insulting clown !!!! The food came out an hour later WAS  told sorry the order was never put in and deleted by accident . In the end the food sucked and NOT a cent was taken off the check GREAT MGMT   - GREAT CUSTOMER SVCE !!!   Never again !!!!

Foods great especially the specially 2 for $22 but service is a 1 star your sitting there for 10 minutes and no waiter service at all finally call over a manager and he's like well what do you want me to tell you. I'm still in shock like is your mgmt team this poorly operated. If I didn't call someone over who could have been there probably for another ten. He's answer let me pay for dessert. I'm like no we rather leave!!

I went here with my friend and we got the deal for $35.00 we both got our own margaritas which was good. Ad we got to pick an appetizer  we got the Texas fries with ranch was good. ,qe got our own entries  , and desert of the chocolate cake which was very good. We also shared a corn. Which was delicious.  The water was great. The only thing I have negative to say is that they have to keep up with the cleaning of the woman's bathroom.   It was. Nastyyy

Arrived on Sunday around 1:00pm, stood at greeter station for around 5 minutes before anyone even acknowledged us, finally a non smiling young girl seats us and says "someone will be with you" a few minutes she comes back and takes our order, food arrives and mine is eh ok, my Wife's Fajita, burned dried out over-seasoned meat total yuck, so to sum it up, lackluster food, lackluster service, stick to Diner's or maybe other chains skip this one

I came here last night for a girls night out and had such a wonderful experience! We usually have a hit or miss here but last night was different. We were greeted with smiles and the restaurant was nice and clean. Our waitresses name was Kelly T. And she also introduced us to her partner Stephanie . The two were a great team. Kelly really made our night out great, she was funny and well mannered. I will be back just because of her !! Hopefully the experience will be just as great. I highly recommend you check this spot out if you haven't already! Try the cookie skillet it was delicious :)
This is my first time going to chili's in Staten Island and in general. The chili is really big inside and our waitress was really sweet. The food was really good as well.

This was my first time trying chilis and the food was amazing ... this place puts Applebee's and Fridays to shame..  The apps were huge and by the time your food comes your stuffed but will return for sure

I would love to give a great review but I can't.  Let me start by saying that I've had very good experiences here before so maybe this was just a fluke?   Yesterday we ordered carside food.  The girl that handled our order was excellent, however the food was not.   The portions were extremely small.  Taste was ok, but they also forgot part of the order.  We were already at work so we couldn't return to get the missing portion.   Normally I pay credit so they probably could have refunded the difference if I called, but this time I paid cash. I would go back again, but was disappointed this time.

This is one of the friendliest Chili's locations I've ever been to. Service is fast and the food is what you expect. I was here on a late Sunday summer afternoon and service was very quick.  Next time you're stuck in some 278 traffic with no hope in sight, pull off and stop by this place.

Total disappointment, and big mistake going here when there's so many other, and better options, right there! The service wasn't good at all, the table we sat at was tiny, everything was brought out at once (appetizer with entre) and there was barely any room on table for everything.. the waitress wasn't attentive at all, never came back to check on us or take some of the plates away to make more room. She came back once at the end and said "dessert" then when we said no she just brought the check. The food itself ehh, 1st off not great, and 2nd off, the entre I ordered was tiny! it was supposed to come with a side of rice and broccoli, well it came with way more rice and broccoli.. so basically it was if I went out to dinner and ordered broccoli and rice with a tiny side of my entre.  I had to stop for a pizza on the way home after going out to "dinner" here. Awful experience, my 1st and last time ever going here. Not a fan of apple bees really, but there's an apple bees just up the block from this place, which this place makes look like a great choice.. Save yourself the mistake and go to 1 of the many other food places, within walking distance of this place, to eat.
Great place for classic margaritas, beer, and burgers. Catch a game on TV's by the bar. A casual family and everybody restaurant.

Worst service ever! We had a party of 11 - which is a large group! But only half of our orders came out and after 25 mins, the other half were still no where in sight. We look over to see that our waitress is enjoying her dinner. She never checked to see if our orders were okay or not. Once we told her we didn't have our food yet, she checks to see that she inputted our order wrong in the beginning and the other half we're never rung in and the kitchen was only NOW starting them. At this point, the ones who didn't get their orders yet have been waiting for about 45 mins for their food. We didn't even want the other orders. We left still hungry and frustrated with the horrendous service we experienced. Never ever going back to this location again.

This place has great service but terrible food and a dirty bathroom.  I was here for dinner on a Saturday night. There was a wait and we decided to sit at the bar and have dinner and drinks. The bartender was very nice. It was a bit odd that she was the only bartender and expected to serve the people sitting at the bar and the drinks for the tables.  I ordered the chicken fajitas. The rice was stale and the chicken wasn't very good. It tasted like frozen chicken. The guacamole was fine and so was the tortillas. My friend ordered the half rack of baby back ribs. The ribs were cooked fine but they were a bit dry.  She had it with a side of clearly frozen broccoli. The drinks were fine we had the presidente margaritas and the house margaritas. The house margaritas were much better than the presidente.  The bathroom I was not clean at all. There was tissue all over the floor and no paper towels. Seemed like it hadn't been serviced all night. I dont know if I am willing to give this place a second chance.

Decent chain restaurant, pretty much your average no frills type establishment.  Menu was generic and what you would expect. It was moderately crowded but I was seated quickly.  They have TVs to watch different sports on.  They crowd the tables real close leaving you very little room to maneuver, making it uncomfortable. The restrooms were dirty and needed a good cleaning. Nothing great here and wouldn't recommend.
